result.longName: Equatorial Pará Distribuidora de Energia S.A.

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Equatorial Pará Distribuidora de Energia S.A. distributes electricity to residential, industrial, commercial, and corporate customers in the state of Pará. It serves 144 municipalities comprising approximately 456,710 customers. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Belém, Brazil. Equatorial Pará Distribuidora de Energia S.A. is a subsidiary of Equatorial Energia S.A.
